mapper.insert: insert into tbl_banner (banner_title, banner_date, banner_date_end, file_name, banner_url) values (#{bannerTitle},#{bannerDate},#{bannerDateEnd},#{fileName},#{bannerUrl})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_banner order by banner_number desc
select user_number,user_nickname,user_id,user_date from tbl_user order by user_date desc ;
select count(board_number) from tbl_board where user_number =#{userNumber} and board_category ="프로젝트";
select count(board_number) from tbl_board where user_number =#{userNumber} and board_category ="스터디";
select count(board_number) from tbl_board where user_number = #{userNumber}
select count(board_reply_number) from tbl_board_reply where user_number = #{userNumber};
select count(inquiry_number) from tbl_inquiry where user_number = #{userNumber};
select count(board_company) from tbl_board where board_company = #{boardCompany};
select b.board_title, b.board_category, b.board_date, b.board_views, b.board_number, u.user_nickname,u.user_number from tbl_user u join tbl_board b on u.user_number = b.user_number

select board_reply_content,board_title,board_date , user_nickname ,board_reply_number ,board_reply_date from tbl_board_reply a , tbl_user b , tbl_board c where a.user_number = b.user_number and a.board_number = c.board_number order by board_date desc
select count(*) from tbl_board_reply a,tbl_user b,tbl_board c where a.user_number = b.user_number and a.board_number = c.board_number
select i.inquiry_content,u.user_nickname,i.inquiry_date,i.inquiry_status,i.inquiry_number from tbl_inquiry i join tbl_user u on i.user_number = u.user_number order by inquiry_date desc;
select count(*) from tbl_inquiry i join tbl_user u on i.user_number = u.user_number ;
mapper.update: update tbl_inquiry set inquiry_content = #{inquiryContent} where inquiry_number = #{inquiryNumber}
